name: log_performance_report
description: Logs daily or weekly poultry flock performance and provides contextual guidance.

response.description: A warm, farmer-friendly response in the detected language with full guidance and confirmation.

log_type.description: Identifies the type of log entry as a performance report.

average_weight_kg.description: Average body weight per bird in kg.

mortality_count.description: Number of birds that died during the period.

eggs_per_day.description: Number of eggs produced per day.

shell_quality_issues.description: Any issues with eggshell quality (soft, cracked, thin).

feed_intake_status.description: Status of feed consumption: eating_well, picky, not_eating.

animals_count.description: Number of animals related to feed intake status

next_action.description: Whether to ask for more missing fields or complete the log.
